p: Azadirachta indica L. is highly medicinal plant with all parts reported to be used for medicinal purposes e.g. antiviral, anticancer, immune-modulator, skin disorders, liver function improvements, blood detoxifier and anti-inflammation ( Pai et al., 2004). Ocimum sanctum is another important plant reported for anti-microbial properties. Citrus limon has been reported as enriched source of vitamin C along with antiviral, anti-diabetic, antimicrobial properties and high alkaloids, flavonoids contents ( Harsha et al., 2016, Hammer et al., 1999).
